## Overview

NARC-1 is the first HF station on your left as you enter the station.

![NARC-1 operating position](include/img/narc-1-operating-position.jpeg){#fig-narc-1-operating-position}

### Equipment summary

- [Icom IC-7610 (HF + 6m) transceiver](icom-ic-7610.qmd)
    - Astron RS-35A power supply
- Icom SM-50 desk mic
- Clipper PTT footswitch
- Heil Pro-7 headset
- Halibut Electronics Audio Interface equipment, see @fig-narc1-audio-connections.
- Nifty mini-manual and other manuals
  - Check the right side of the operating position and the drawer under the radio.

- HP PC, dual monitor set-up

- Elecraft [KPA1500](KPA1500.qmd) amplifier
  - Elecraft power supply

  A ---|USB|C[NARC1 PC]

### Software summary

::: {.callout-note}
## Under the hood
These sections are generated by parsing a CSV data file in `include/csv/software_versions.csv`.

The code is hidden in the output for aesthetic reasons, but may be revealed by examining the source code file.
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
software_versions <- readr::read_csv("include/csv/software_versions.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

narc1 <- software_versions |>
  dplyr::filter(station == 'narc1')
```

#### Operating System

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: tbl-narc1-os
#| tbl-cap: "Operating system(s) on NARC-1"
narc1 |>
  dplyr::filter(type == "os") |>
  dplyr::select(software, version, date) |>
  knitr::kable(format = "html") 
```
